colon.description: Configure the default value for 'colon' for Form.Item. Indicates whether to display a colon after label (only valid if the property layout is horizontal)
colon.description_zh: 配置 Form.Item 的 `colon` 的默认值。表示是否显示 label 后面的冒号 (只有在属性 layout 为 horizontal 时有效)

disabled.description: Set the form component to be disabled, only for the antd component
disabled.description_zh: 设置表单组件禁用，仅对 antd 组件有效

component.description: Set the Form render element to 'false' to create no DOM node
component.description_zh: 设置 Form 渲染元素，为 `false` 则不创建 DOM 节点

:fields.description: Control form fields through state management (e.g., Redux), which is not recommended if not strongly demanded
:fields.description_zh: 通过状态管理（如 redux）控制表单字段，如非强需求不推荐使用

:form.description: A control instance of form created by 'Form.useForm()' is automatically created when not available
:form.description_zh: 经 `Form.useForm()` 创建的 form 控制实例，不提供时会自动创建

:feedbackIcons.description: When the Form.Item has a hasFeedback property, the icon can be customized
:feedbackIcons.description_zh: 当 Form.Item 有 hasFeedback 属性时可以自定义图标

:initialValues.description: The form default, which only takes effect when initialized and reset
:initialValues.description_zh: 表单默认值，只有初始化以及重置时生效

labelAlign.description: The text alignment of the label label
labelAlign.description_zh: label 标签的文本对齐方式

labelWrap.description: The way the text wraps for label labels
labelWrap.description_zh: label 标签的文本换行方式

:labelCol.description: label layout, with the ''' component, set the 'span' 'offset' value, such as '{span: 3, offset: 12}' <Col>or 'sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}'
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span` `offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`

name.description: The form name, which is prefixed with the form field 'id'
name.description_zh: 表单名称，会作为表单字段 `id` 前缀使用

preserve.description: When a field is deleted, the field value is retained
preserve.description_zh: 当字段被删除时保留字段值

requiredMark.description: Required style, which can be switched to a required or optional display style. This is a Form configuration and cannot be configured separately for Form.Item
requiredMark.description_zh: 必选样式，可以切换为必选或者可选展示样式。此为 Form 配置，Form.Item 无法单独配置

scrollToFirstError.description: Submission failures automatically scroll to the first error field
scrollToFirstError.description_zh: 提交失败自动滚动到第一个错误字段

size.description: Set the size of the field component (antd component only)
size.description_zh: 设置字段组件的尺寸（仅限 antd 组件）

validateTrigger.description: Uniformly set when a field triggers validation
validateTrigger.description_zh: 统一设置字段触发验证的时机

:wrapperCol.description: Use this property when you need to style a layout for an input control, and use it in the same way as labelCol
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 labelCol

methods.name: clearValidate
methods.description: Removes the validation result of the form item. Enter the name attribute or array of name of the form item to be removed, and remove the verification result of the entire form if not
methods.description_zh: 移除表单项的校验结果。传入待移除的表单项的 name 属性或者 name 组成的数组，如不传则移除整个表单的校验结果

methods.name: resetFields
methods.description: Reset the entire form, reset all field values to their default values, and remove the validation results
methods.description_zh: 对整个表单进行重置，将所有字段值重置为初始值并移除校验结果

methods.name: scrollToField
methods.description: Scroll to the corresponding field location
methods.params: (name: [NamePath](#namepath), options: \[[ScrollOptions](https: | | github.com | stipsan | scroll-into-view-if-needed | tree | ece40bd9143f48caf4b99503425ecb16b0ad8249#options)]) => void

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Triggers form validation, same as validateFields
methods.description_zh: 触发表单验证, 同 validateFields

events.name: onFieldsChange
events.description: A callback event is triggered when a field is updated
events.description_zh: 字段更新时触发回调事件

events.name: onFinish
events.description: After the form is submitted and the data is validated, the event is called
events.description_zh: 提交表单且数据验证成功后回调事件

events.name: onFinishFailed
events.description: Callback events are called after the form is submitted and the data validation fails
events.description_zh: 提交表单且数据验证失败后回调事件

events.name: onValuesChange
events.description: A callback event is triggered when a field value is updated
events.description_zh: 字段值更新时触发回调事件
